view:properties.cm:description: Space for storing records
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: Records Space

view:properties.cm:description: DOD 5015.2 Test Area
view:properties.cm:title: DOD 5015.2 Test Area
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: DOD Records

view:properties.cm:description: COMBATANT COMMAND COMMANDER/DEPUTY COMMANDER/CHIEF OF STAFF CORRESPONDENCE
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:title: COMBATANT COMMAND COMMANDER/DEPUTY COMMANDER/CHIEF OF STAFF CORRESPONDENCE
view:properties.cm:name: Series 0031

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0031-01 Combatant Command Correspondence
view:properties.cm:description: Memorandums issued/signed by the commander/deputy commander/chief of staff of the combatant command, Command Policy Memorandums serially numbered, and Command Numbered Memorandums, correspondence, messages, briefings, reports, and all related background material.
view:properties.cm:title: Combatant Command Correspondence
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Permanent. Cut off annually, hold 2 years beyond end of commander/deputy commander/chief of staff tour of duty, then transfer to Inactive Storage Facility (ISF.) Accession to NARA 25 years after cutoff.

view:properties.cm:description: UNIT MANNING DOCUMENTS (UMDs)
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:title: UNIT MANNING DOCUMENTS (UMDs)
view:properties.cm:name: Series 0105

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0105-01 Unit Manning Documents
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of: draft manpower document and monthly strength report forwarded to OSD and other activities. Which are: maintained by personnel office as the official record copy.
view:properties.cm:title: Unit Manning Documents
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off every 3 months, hold 3 months, then destroy/delete.

view:properties.cm:description: MANPOWER AND PRODUCTIVITY ENHANCEMENT STUDIES
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:title: MANPOWER AND PRODUCTIVITY ENHANCEMENT STUDIES
view:properties.cm:name: Series 0106

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0106-01 ManpowerStudies Supporting Data
view:properties.cm:description: Documents created in connection with manpower surveys and studies covering personnel authorizations, manning levels, manpower analysis and requirements, workload and performance measures, staffing standards, and related documentation. Which are: maintained by any JS/combatant command activity as the official record copy
view:properties.cm:title: ManpowerStudies Supporting Data
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Destroy/delete when superseded by a like survey or study, or when no longer needed, whichever is later.

view:properties.rma:subject: Staffing Strategies
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: Folder 0001 - Folder 001 - Staffing Strategies
view:properties.cm:description: Destroy/delete when superseded by a like survey or study, or when no longer needed, whichever is later.
view:properties.cm:title: Staffing Strategies

view:properties.cm:description: PAYROLL CORRESPONDENCE
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:title: PAYROLL CORRESPONDENCE
view:properties.cm:name: Series 0205

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0205-02 Merit Pay Records
view:properties.cm:description: Information for a merit pay unit listing covered employees. Consisting of: initial salary, computation of funds for the unit, salary increases granted automatically, merit pay increases granted based on points received from a performance appraisal rating, and similar information. Which are: maintained by any JS/combatant command activity.
view:properties.cm:title: Merit Pay Records
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off on computation of pay increase, hold 7 years, then destroy/delete.

view:properties.rma:subject: Cut off on computation of pay increase, hold 7 years, then destroy/delete.
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: Folder 0001 - Folder 001 - Jayne Dough
view:properties.cm:description: Cut off on computation of pay increase, hold 7 years, then destroy/delete.
view:properties.cm:title: Jayne Dough

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0205-03 Differential and Allowances
view:properties.cm:description: Differential and allowances. Consisting of: information to assist overseas civilian personnel offices to document employee eligibility for foreign post differential and foreign quarters and post allowances, including SF 1190 (Foreign Allowances Application, Grant, and Report) and similar information. Which are: maintained by any JS/combatant command activity
view:properties.cm:title: Differential and Allowances
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off at end of FY in which all allowances are terminated; final disposition TBD.

view:properties.rma:subject: Cut off at end of FY in which all allowances are terminated; final disposition TBD.
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: Folder 0001 - Folder 001 - SF 1190 Data
view:properties.cm:description: Cut off at end of FY in which all allowances are terminated; final disposition TBD.
view:properties.cm:title: SF 1190 Data

view:properties.cm:description: STANDARDS OF CONDUCT
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:title: STANDARDS OF CONDUCT
view:properties.cm:name: Series 0216

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0216-01 Standards of Conduct Correspondence
view:properties.cm:description: Correspondence, memorandums, and other records relating to code of ethics and standards of conduct. Which are: maintained by any JS/combatant command activity.
view:properties.cm:title: Standards of Conduct Correspondence

view:properties.cm:description: LABOR MANAGEMENT RELATIONS RECORDS
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:title: LABOR MANAGEMENT RELATIONS RECORDS
view:properties.cm:name: Series 0220

rma:filePlan.view:childName: cm:0220-04 Memorandums of Agreement Under Labor Management Relations

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0220-04 Memorandums of Agreement Under Labor Management Relations
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of: initial union proposals, counter proposals, working documents, and approved agreements. Which are: maintained by any JS/combatant command activity.
view:properties.cm:title: Memorandums of Agreement Under Labor Management Relations
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off when superseded or obsolete, hold 4 years, then destroy/delete.

cm:folder.view:childName: cm:Folder 001 - Agreement on Union Representation on Adverse Action Cases

view:properties.rma:subject: Cut off when superseded or obsolete, hold 4 years, then destroy/delete.
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: Folder 001 - Agreement on Union Representation on Adverse Action Cases
view:properties.cm:description: Cut off when superseded or obsolete, hold 4 years, then destroy/delete.
view:properties.cm:title: Agreement on Union Representation on Adverse Action Cases
view:properties.cm:author: Defense Information Systems Agency

view:properties.cm:description: LAW LIBRARIES
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:title: LAW LIBRARIES
view:properties.cm:name: Series 0414

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0414-01 Library Acquisition Records
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of: requisitions, receiving reports, purchase orders, packing lists, requests for issue or turn-in, and related records which are control records accumulated by librarians for material procured from centrally-funded sources that exceed $2,000. Which are: maintained by any JS/combatant command activity.
view:properties.cm:title: Library Acquisition Records
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off after final payment; hold 6 years, 3 months, then destroy/delete.

view:properties.rma:subject: Cut off after final payment; hold 6 years, 3 months, then destroy/delete.
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: Folder 0001 - McMillian Publishing
view:properties.cm:description: Cut off after final payment; hold 6 years, 3 months, then destroy/delete.
view:properties.cm:title: McMillian Publishing

view:properties.cm:description: FOIA CONTROL
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:title: FOIA CONTROL
view:properties.cm:name: Series 0927

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.rma:eventTrigger: Cut off on date of last entry
view:properties.cm:name: 0927-01 FOIA Response Register
view:properties.cm:description: Files maintained for control purposes in responding to requests, including registers and similar records listing date, nature and purpose of request, and name and address of requestor. Consisting of: the register or listing. Which are: maintained by any JS/combatant command activity as the official record copy.
view:properties.cm:title: FOIA Response Register
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off on date of last entry, hold 6 years, then destroy/delete.

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0927-04 FOIA Reports
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of: reports relating to recurring reports and one-time information requirements on implementation of FOIA, including annual reports to Congress. Which are: maintained by any JS/combatant command activity.
view:properties.cm:title: FOIA Reports
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off annually, hold 2 years, then destroy/delete.

view:properties.cm:description: SCIENCE ADVISOR RECORDS/ACTIVITIE
view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:title: SCIENCE ADVISOR RECORDS/ACTIVITIE
view:properties.cm:name: Series 0942

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: 0942-01 Science Advisor Records
view:properties.cm:description: Records generated by the science advisor. Consisting of: reports, studies, tasking orders, and similar records. Reports are usually informal and unpublished. Records may be generated at all activities. Which are: maintained by any JS/combatant command activity as the official record copy.
view:properties.cm:title: Science Advisor Records
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Permanent. Cut off on completion of study, hold 5 years, then transfer by CY block to RHA. Accession to NARA in 5-year blocks 25 years after cutoff.

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: Folder 0001 - Ft. Huachuca Environmental Impact Study
view:properties.cm:description: Permanent. Cut off on completion of study, hold 5 years, then transfer by CY block to RHA. Accession to NARA in 5-year blocks 25 years after cutoff.
view:properties.cm:title: Ft. Huachuca Environmental Impact Study

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: Folder 0002 - Ft. Huachuca Pollution Advisory Report
view:properties.cm:description: Permanent. Cut off on completion of study, hold 5 years, then transfer by CY block to RHA. Accession to NARA in 5-year blocks 25 years after cutoff.
view:properties.cm:title: Ft. Huachuca Pollution Advisory Report

view:properties.cm:creator: admin
view:properties.cm:name: Folder 0003 - Ft. Huachuca Wildlife Diversity Study
view:properties.cm:description: Permanent. Cut off on completion of study, hold 5 years, then transfer by CY block to RHA. Accession to NARA in 5-year blocks 25 years after cutoff.
view:properties.cm:title: Ft. Huachuca Wildlife Diversity Study
